data.name: labelIncludeTerms.Help
data.value: Select the terms for news entries to display by the module.

data.name: labelShowAllNews.Help
data.value: If checked, module will show all news on the site, ignoring 'IncludeTerms' setting.

data.name: labelThumbnailWidth.Help
data.value: Set width in px for generated thumbnail image.

data.name: ThumbnailWidth.Invalid
data.value: Thumbnail width must be an integer from 1 to 4096.

data.name: labelShowTopPager.Help
data.value: Check to show top paging control.

data.name: labelShowBottomPager.Help
data.value: Check to show bottom paging control.

data.name: labelPageSize.Help
data.value: Set number of news entries displayed per one page.

data.name: PageSize.Invalid
data.value: Page size must be an integer between from 1 to 100.

data.name: labelMaxPageLinks.Help
data.value: Set maximum number of page links in pager controls.

data.name: MaxPageLinks.Required
data.value: Maximum page links value is required.

data.name: MaxPageLinks.Invalid
data.value: Maximum page links value must be an integer between from 1 to 100.
